document.full_text: rio de janeiro's hosting of the 2014 world cup and the 2016 olympics is an unprecedented chance to promote brand brazil and ensure a legacy of economic and social benefits, former british prime minister tony blair said on friday.
document.title: rio should focus on branding for olympic gold: blair
